question: Who is the Chairperson of the Parliamentary Standing Committee on Information and Technology, that has started working on Aarogya Setu app?
explanation:
The Parliamentary Standing Committee on Information and Technology has started working on queries on privacy of the Aarogya Setu application.
The Chairperson of the Parliamentary committee on IT is Shashi Tharoor. He said that despite challenges in organising meeting, the committee has started functioning. Data security of the application and the imposition on using the app would be focussed in the meeting.
